name: Beradex
description: What is the project about? Beradex is a Automated Market Maker with built-in Stableswaps on Berachain's Polaris VM. What makes your project unique? Beradex offers a CPMM-style DEX (UniV2) alongside its Curve-style swaps in one swap page for a better user experience, along with its soon to come NFT yield boosts where users can lock in their NFT & LP tokens for boosted & vested rewards. History of your project. Beradex is a grassroots DEX project fully funded by the community on Berachain. So far, Beradex has upgraded from being just a fork to offering Stableswaps on the AMM. Beradex is run by a core team of 3 and is planning to expand soon. Whatâ€™s next for your project? The project will soon offer the NFT yield boosts to users on testnet, with our Ursa NFTs being the first ones to be utilized in the boosted farming during mainnet. What can your token be used for? BRDX can be used for governance, LP pairing for farming, wrapped for XBRDX for fee revenue sharing (staking derivative), used as currency during the Ursa NFT minting event, with more features to be rolled out.
